“It’s not been the easiest of times for Carla. She’s been trying to find a nanny who is right for her and the children. She is yet to find one she likes,” a source told the Sunday People . 
“It has obviously been tough given everything that has been going on between Jeremy and Vicky. For years and years Vicky was in their lives to look after the children and now everything has turned on its head,” the source added. Splash News 4 Jeremy and Carla have three children together 
The Sunday paper also claims that Jeremy and Vicky plan to spend as much time as possible in Barbados as it is a haven for them to enjoy each other’s company. 
“They can enjoy themselves as a new couple in love rather than staying hidden away. He’s enjoying getting on with his new life,” the source said. 
Carla’s search for a nanny comes after it was revealed last month that Jeremy had left her. 
Shortly after the revelation, Carla was spotted taking boxing lessons after finding out about his relationship with Vicky. 4 Carla Germaine has been spotted taking boxing lessons after finding out about his relationship with their kids’ nanny 
But Carla was clearly keen to fight back as she laced up her boxing gloves at posh Royal Berkshire Health and Racquet Club in Bracknell, Berkshire. 
A pal said: “It has been the toughest few weeks of Carla’s life after the shock of learning that the nanny who was her best friend and who had looked after the children for over a decade was now dating Jeremy. 
“Carla is worried how their dad seeing the nanny will affect their children. 4 Former model Carla suffered a blow after it was revealed that telly star Jezza had started seeing Vicky Burton 
“She is trying to stay strong and hitting the gym to help keep her focus on the kids who are her world. 
“She wants Jeremy to be happy but she can’t understand why he would want to date their nanny knowing all the hurt it has caused.”
